languages.text: "Я же делаю то, что необходимо для благополучия всего Империума. И если представитель Инквизиции говорит тебе прямым текстом, что ты на волоске от ереси — советую прислушаться".
"I am doing only what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you that you are on the verge of heresy, I advise that you listen."
languages.original_text: "Я же делаю то, что необходимо для благополучия всего Империума. И если представитель Инквизиции говорит тебе прямым текстом, что ты на волоске от ереси — советую прислушаться".

traits.locale_text: "And I am only doing what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you, in so many words, that you are a hair's width away from heresy, my advice is to take note."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And I am only doing what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you, in so many words, that you are a hair's width away from heresy, my advice is to take note."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am doing only what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you that you are on the verge of heresy, I advise that you listen."

traits.locale_text: "I am doing only what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you that you are on the verge of heresy, I advise that you listen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Solamente hago lo que es necesario para la prosperidad de todo el Imperium. Por eso, cuando un miembro de la Inquisición le advierte que se halla al borde de la herejía, le recomiendo que le escuche».
languages.original_text: "I am doing only what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you that you are on the verge of heresy, I advise that you listen."

traits.locale_text: «Solamente hago lo que es necesario para la prosperidad de todo el Imperium. Por eso, cuando un miembro de la Inquisición le advierte que se halla al borde de la herejía, le recomiendo que le escuche».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “而我做的一切，是为了整个帝国的繁荣。因此，如果有审判庭成员告诉你，说你正处于异端的边缘时，我建议你能好好听取这样的警告。”
languages.original_text: "I am doing only what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you that you are on the verge of heresy, I advise that you listen."

traits.locale_text: “而我做的一切，是为了整个帝国的繁荣。因此，如果有审判庭成员告诉你，说你正处于异端的边缘时，我建议你能好好听取这样的警告。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Et moi, je ne fais que ce qui est nécessaire à la prospérité de l'Imperium. Aussi, lorsqu'un membre de l'Inquisition vous dit que vous frôlez l'hérésie, je vous recommande de l'écouter. »
languages.original_text: "I am doing only what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you that you are on the verge of heresy, I advise that you listen."

traits.locale_text: « Et moi, je ne fais que ce qui est nécessaire à la prospérité de l'Imperium. Aussi, lorsqu'un membre de l'Inquisition vous dit que vous frôlez l'hérésie, je vous recommande de l'écouter. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は、帝国全体の繁栄のために必要なことだけを行なっている。だから、異端審問庁のメンバーが、あなたが異端になりかけていると言ったら、耳を傾けることを勧めよう」
languages.original_text: "I am doing only what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you that you are on the verge of heresy, I advise that you listen."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は、帝国全体の繁栄のために必要なことだけを行なっている。だから、異端審問庁のメンバーが、あなたが異端になりかけていると言ったら、耳を傾けることを勧めよう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich tue nur, was für den Wohlstand des gesamten Imperiums nötig ist. Wenn Euch also ein Mitglied der Inquisition sagt, dass Ihr am Rande der Ketzerei steht, dann solltet Ihr darauf hören."
languages.original_text: "I am doing only what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you that you are on the verge of heresy, I advise that you listen."

traits.locale_text: "Ich tue nur, was für den Wohlstand des gesamten Imperiums nötig ist. Wenn Euch also ein Mitglied der Inquisition sagt, dass Ihr am Rande der Ketzerei steht, dann solltet Ihr darauf hören."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Tüm İmparatorluk'un refahını sağlamak için gereken neyse onu yapıyorum. Bir Engizisyon mensubu sana kâfirliğin eşiğinde olduğunu söylüyorsa ona kulak vermeni tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "I am doing only what is necessary for the prosperity of the entire Imperium. So when a member of the Inquisition tells you that you are on the verge of heresy, I advise that you listen."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm İmparatorluk'un refahını sağlamak için gereken neyse onu yapıyorum. Bir Engizisyon üyesi sana kâfirliğin eşiğinde olduğunu söylüyorsa ona kulak vermeni tavsiye ederim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
